greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonsquarefree terms in 3x+1 trajectory started at n.
link: Jonathan Frech, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
mathematica: c[x_] := (1-Mod[x, 2])*(x/2)+Mod[x, 2]*(3*x+1); c[1]=1; fpl[x_] := Delete[FixedPointList[c, x], -1] lf[x_] := Length[fpl[x]] Table[Count[Table[MoebiusMu[Part[fpl[w], j]], {j, 1, lf[w]}], 0], {w, 1, 256}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 02 2003
